org.sql: SELECT follows.* FROM follows WHERE follows.target_account_id IN ("$1", "$2") AND follows.account_id IN (SELECT follows.target_account_id FROM follows INNER JOIN accounts ON accounts.id = follows.target_account_id WHERE follows.account_id = "$3" AND (accounts.hide_collections = "$4" OR accounts.hide_collections IS NULL))

rewrites.sql: SELECT follows.* FROM follows WHERE follows.target_account_id IN ("$1", "$2") AND follows.account_id IN (SELECT follows.target_account_id FROM follows INNER JOIN accounts ON accounts.id = follows.target_account_id WHERE follows.account_id = "$3" AND (accounts.hide_collections = "$4" OR accounts.hide_collections IS NULL)) LIMIT 1
